summary: All requested changes from the previous review have been addressed. The variable shadowing issue is fixed (t â†’ closeTimeout), the unused copySnapshotRef has been removed, and the non-null assertion on queue.shift() has been replaced with a safe check pattern. The code is ready to merge.
positives: Variable shadowing fixed: renamed timeout variable from `t` to `closeTimeout` at line 112
Unused ref removed: copySnapshotRef declaration and null assignment are gone
Non-null assertion replaced with safe pattern: `const parentId = queue.shift(); if (!parentId) break;` at line 189-190
Good use of `void` for fire-and-forget async calls to satisfy linting
Proper error handling with typed catch blocks replacing `any` types
